title.rendered: Why do my listings keep getting deactivated?

content.rendered:
Whenever certain changes are done to your listing after it was first published such as (changing location, move-in date, photos, and so on) your listing will go back to pending and it will be re-approved making use of one listing credit.

Please be advised that you will need to have available credits for your listing to be reactivated.

A listing can be deactivated too if:

  • The move-in date passed your listing will be deactivated, make sure the move-in date is current.
  • Lister failed to comply with our listing requirements and created a new listing

excerpt.rendered: Whenever certain changes are done to your listing after it was first published such as (changing location, move-in date, photos, and so on) your listing will go back to pending…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I permanently delete my room listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My ListingsClick the Inactive tabClick the trash can icon to delete your listing iOS Tap on My Listings from the menu at the bottomTap the X icon…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I deactivate my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it. When you reactivate your listing you will need to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Does my listing ever expire?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Your listing will expire a month after the move-in date you selected when you created your listing. We'll send you an email to ask if your room is still available three weeks after your move-in date. You can change the move-in date at any time by editing your room listing…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I create a listing on Roomi?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: You can make use of your two free credits to create two free listings on your Roomi account to post your available room or rooms for rent on Roomi. You must be in Lister Mode to post a listing.  Please reference our Help Center article, 'How do I switch between…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I boost my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly. This feature pushes your listing to the top of the search page in your area, enabling users to see your room first when searching for a place. Listing Boosts are non-refundable Web Login to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I share my listing via SMS, email, Facebook, or other methods?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Login to your Roomi account and click My ListingsClick on the listing you want to share from the Active Listings tabClick the listing photo to preview the listing and you can copy and paste the URL. You can also click and share via the Twitter, Facebook, or Email icons…
